arm_group.description: At the end of the surgery the cma microdialysis catheter is placed near the anastomosis

brief_summary.textblock:
The aim of this study is to monitor by microdialysis the postoperative outcomes in order to
      identify anastomotic leaks after rectal surgery.

clinical_study.brief_title: Monitoring by Microdialysis of Postoperative Complications After Proctectomy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  rectal disease requiring proctectomy with anastomosis and stomy

          -  proctectomy by laparoscopy or laparotomy

          -  written consent

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  history of colorectal surgery

          -  rectal surgery without anastomosis

          -  breastfeeding or pregnancy

          -  ASA score IV

intervention.description: the microdialysis catheters are sold by CMA

clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Microdialysis to Monitor Postoperative Outcomes After Proctectomy

authority: France: Agence Nationale de Sécurité du Médicament et des produits de santé

primary_outcome.description: the anastomotic leaks rate is defined as the number of anastomotic leaks validated by a CT scan or at the clinical examination
